languages.text: The holy shepherds of the faith have noted the growing influence of the von Valancius protectorate and are asking for a donation to fund a new pilgrimage route. Thousands of believers will pay for passage on ships and sing glories to the dynasty's piety.
languages.original_text: Святые пастыри отметили растущее влияние протектората фон Валанциус и просят о пожертвовании на новый маршрут для паломников. Тысячи верующих будут скупать места на кораблях и прославлять благочестивость династии.

traits.locale_text: The holy shepherds of the faith have noted the growing influence of the von Valancius protectorate and are asking for a donation to fund a new pilgrimage route. Thousands of believers will pay for passage on ships and sing glories to the dynasty's piety.

languages.text: Святые пастыри отметили растущее влияние протектората фон Валанциус и просят о пожертвовании на новый маршрут для паломников. Тысячи верующих будут скупать места на кораблях и прославлять благочестивость династии.
这群帝国信仰的忠诚追随者注意到，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的影响力变得越来越大。他们希望能得到捐款，以便开拓一条新的朝圣者路线。届时，成千上万的信徒将会支付登船费用，同时唱响圣歌，赞颂冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的虔诚。
languages.original_text: The holy shepherds of the faith have noted the growing influence of the von Valancius protectorate and are asking for a donation to fund a new pilgrimage route. Thousands of believers will pay for passage on ships and sing glories to the dynasty's piety.

traits.locale_text: 这群帝国信仰的忠诚追随者注意到，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的影响力变得越来越大。他们希望能得到捐款，以便开拓一条新的朝圣者路线。届时，成千上万的信徒将会支付登船费用，同时唱响圣歌，赞颂冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的虔诚。

languages.text: 敬虔な聖なる羊飼いたちは、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の保護領の影響力の増大に注目しており、新たな巡礼路の資金提供を求めている。何千もの信者たちが船の通行料を支払い、その王朝の敬虔さを讃える歌を歌うだろう。
languages.original_text: The holy shepherds of the faith have noted the growing influence of the von Valancius protectorate and are asking for a donation to fund a new pilgrimage route. Thousands of believers will pay for passage on ships and sing glories to the dynasty's piety.

traits.locale_text: 敬虔な聖なる羊飼いたちは、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の保護領の影響力の増大に注目しており、新たな巡礼路の資金提供を求めている。何千もの信者たちが船の通行料を支払い、その王朝の敬虔さを讃える歌を歌うだろう。

languages.text: Die heiligen Hirten des Glaubens haben den wachsenden Einfluss des Protektorats von Valancius bemerkt und bitten um eine Spende zur Finanzierung einer neuen Pilgerroute. Tausende von Gläubigen werden Schiffspassagen buchen und ein Loblied auf die Frömmigkeit der Dynastie anstimmen.
languages.original_text: The holy shepherds of the faith have noted the growing influence of the von Valancius protectorate and are asking for a donation to fund a new pilgrimage route. Thousands of believers will pay for passage on ships and sing glories to the dynasty's piety.

traits.locale_text: Die heiligen Hirten des Glaubens haben den wachsenden Einfluss des Protektorats von Valancius bemerkt und bitten um eine Spende zur Finanzierung einer neuen Pilgerroute. Tausende von Gläubigen werden Schiffspassagen buchen und ein Loblied auf die Frömmigkeit der Dynastie anstimmen.

languages.text: İnancın kutsal çobanları, von Valancius protektorasının günden güne serpilip güçlendiğini gördü. Yeni bir hac güzergâhı açmak için bağış talep ediyorlar. Binlerce inançlı, gemilere biniş harcı ödeyip hanedanlığın takvasını ilahilerle yâd edecek.
languages.original_text: The holy shepherds of the faith have noted the growing influence of the von Valancius protectorate and are asking for a donation to fund a new pilgrimage route. Thousands of believers will pay for passage on ships and sing glories to the dynasty's piety.

traits.locale_text: İnancın kutsal çobanları, von Valancius protektorasının günden güne serpilip güçlendiğini görmüşlerdir. Yeni bir hac güzergâhı açmak için bağış talep ederler. Binlerce inançlı, gemilere biniş harcı ödeyip hanedanlığın takvasını ilahilerle yad edecektir.

languages.text: Los santos pastores de la fe han tomado nota de la influencia en aumento del protectorado von Valancius y solicitan una donación para fundar una nueva ruta de peregrinaje. Miles de creyentes pagarán por el viaje en nave y cantarán alabanzas por la piedad de la dinastía.
languages.original_text: The holy shepherds of the faith have noted the growing influence of the von Valancius protectorate and are asking for a donation to fund a new pilgrimage route. Thousands of believers will pay for passage on ships and sing glories to the dynasty's piety.

traits.locale_text: Los santos pastores de la fe han tomado nota de la influencia en aumento del protectorado von Valancius y solicitan una donación para fundar una nueva ruta de peregrinaje. Miles de creyentes pagarán por el viaje en nave y cantarán alabanzas por la piedad de la dinastía.

languages.text: Les saints pasteurs ont remarqué l'influence croissante du protectorat von Valancius et demandent un don pour financer un nouvel itinéraire de pèlerinage. Des milliers de croyants paieront pour voyager à bord de vaisseaux et chanter la gloire de la pieuse dynastie.
languages.original_text: The holy shepherds of the faith have noted the growing influence of the von Valancius protectorate and are asking for a donation to fund a new pilgrimage route. Thousands of believers will pay for passage on ships and sing glories to the dynasty's piety.
